pets: Is there a vicious breed restriction? What breeds are considered vicious?
smoking: Is smoking allowed only on balconies?
Where is smoking allowed in the building?
Are there Marijuana restrictions? What are they?
rental: Is there a limit to rented suites in the building? How many?
Is there a length of time of rental requirement?
Are Short Term Rentals allowed? such as airbnb, vrbo
Is a Bed and Breakfast allowed?
Are there any restrictions to Short Term Rentals?
Are there restrictions to Guests in the Short Term Rental?
BBQ: What type of BBQ is allowed?
other: Does the strata have quiet hours?
Are Christmas Trees and Holiday decorations allowed?
Is Air Conditioning allowed in the strata unit?
What is the Strata's responsibility to repair and insure?

Move in/out Fees: Is there a fee to move in or move out?
What is the notice required moving in or move out?
What is the move in and move out times?
Strata Fee Increase: Are Strata fees increasing this year? How much and what's the percentage?
elevator: What is the age of the elevator?
Does the elevator break down often?
Is the elevator out of order reported?
building exterior: Are there reports of water ingress?
Is there planned Building exterior maintenance? What is planned?
leaks: Are there any reports of leaks in the building or between units? Who was at fault?
Did the leak cause a Strata Insurance claim?
What was the cause of the leak?
mould: Any reports of mould within suites?
legal/civil resolutions: Does the strata have any Legal or Civil suits?
plumbing: Any reports of leaks in the plumbing?
Any Pinhole leaks in the plumbing?
Was any part of the plumbing replaced?
roof: Does the rooftop have annual or regular maintenance?
Reports of leaks on the roof?
What is the age of the roof?
security: Any reports of break ins? If so, Where? What?
Did they fix what was broken into?
windows: Are there issues with the windows? Broken seals or fogged glass?
Is there any window replacement planned?
engineer reports: Does the Engineer report have any comments?
insurance claims: Are there insurance claims? What were they for?
renovation requests: Are there renovation requests? Were they approved?
pests: Are there reports of pests in the building or units? Mice, rats, ants, bed bugs?
fire inspections: Do Annual fire inspections happen yearly?

financial: What is the maintenance budget? (general repairs and maintenance)
How much cash is in reserve?
Is there a yearly contingency fund contribution?
Is there budget for window cleaning?
Is there budget for pest control?
Is there budget for dryer duct cleaning?
Are budget items separate or included in a larger item?

depreciation: When was the Depreciation Report report done?
